function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased demand for food and grocery delivery leading to higher exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of the virus within bank branches due to close customer and employee interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance from customers intimidated by increased digitalization, leading to potential exclusion from banking services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate decision-making by customers during distress, leading to potential financial challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased loans in ’other loans’ category indicate potential household debt accumulation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid increase in loan stock may indicate excessive risk-taking by banks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effective marketing may have led to increased borrowing and debt accumulation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharp decline at the end of march followed by a rise in april and may","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rising trend in online shopping and credit card usage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Banks giving importance to protecting loans and assets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in consumer confidence leading to reduced expenditures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in industrial production and retail sales","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drop in credit card expenditures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging businesses to take on new loans or extend existing loans could increase financial vulnerability and debt burden.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simplified procedures for banking transactions could lead to increased cyber security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging face-to-face transactions in branch for certain transactions could increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical contact during cash transactions at atms","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High usage of call centers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of elderly population to disease transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in bank branches due to lack of social distancing and contact reduction measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in business volumes due to limited access to physical branches and preference for face-to-face banking.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty stemming from the interdependence of participants in an exchange","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crisis situations can damage a quality relationship","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bank customers are results driven and care about functional quality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in demand for banking services due to decline in economic activity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in non-performing loans and bankruptcies due to businesses closing and households losing income","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in maintaining social distancing and following lockdown rules while conducting banking activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential resurgence of covid-19 due to relaxation of restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns over reduced demand in the early stages of normalization","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Citizens under 20 likely to carry the virus without symptoms and infect others","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns about psychological and emotional wellbeing of restricted individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emotional, psychological, sociological consequences and serious economic implications","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of public places and businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of movement for elderly and high-risk individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of curfew and fines for non-compliance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on deposit banking and food service industries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic uncertainty and severe financial distress for firms","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic downturn and recession due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vaccination availability","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in implementing new ways of interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of services to the new normal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personalized experiences leading to customer dissatisfaction and reduced loyalty.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing use of face masks and sanitizers may lead to environmental pollution and waste management issues.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote services and virtual try-ons may lead to a decrease in in-store foot traffic, impacting physical retailers and the local economy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of technology for shelf monitoring and clean surfaces may lead to data privacy and cybersecurity risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty and vulnerability to a second wave of infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
